LIVERPOOL – The CEO of Centrica, the parent company of British Gas, told a Labour Conference event today that responsibility for energy and climate policy should be stripped from politicians. Speaking on a panel with Labour’s Energy and Net Zero Minister Michael Shanks, Centrica boss Chris O’Shea said that politicians were only concerned with short-term […]

The post Energy Policy Shouldn’t be in Hands of Politicians, British Gas Boss Tells Labour Minister appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Energy Policy Shouldn’t be in Hands of Politicians, British Gas Boss Tells Labour Minister
